search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Gavel (gavel.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Gavel is: https://www.gavel.io/pricing .

extracted_content.content:

We’re transforming how legal professionals practice law. But don’t take our word for it…
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Check out Gavel's use cases:

[Automate any document](https://www.gavel.io/use-cases/document-automation)[Create client-facing tools](https://www.gavel.io/use-cases/create-client-facing-tools)

[Manage client intake data](https://www.gavel.io/use-cases/manage-client-data)[Sell online legal services](https://www.gavel.io/use-cases/sell-online-legal-services)

[Make custom workflows](https://www.gavel.io/use-cases/make-custom-workflows)

Frequently asked questions:
---------------------------

What are my payment options? Credit card and/or invoicing?

We accept payment via credit card for monthly subscriptions. For annual subscriptions, we also accept ACH, wire transfer, or check.

We need to add new users to our team. How will that be billed?

If you have a Lite or Standard subscription, you must upgrade to Pro or Scale to add additional Builders or Organizational Users to your account. If you have a Pro or Scale subscription, Builders and Organizational Users above those allotted in your tier are billed at $50/mo or $35/mo respectively. We do provide discounts based on volume and for annual and multi-year contracts.

Can you help me build my automations?

Yes, with our [Hire an Automator program](https://www.gavel.io/hire-an-automator), you can send over your documents and get a quote from one of the Gavel-vetted automators. Depending on your budget, you can choose from attonryes and paralegals who will help you develop a strategy. We also have lower-cost automators who are "executors," meaning they may not give you strategic insight, but they can execute exactly what you give them with quality and attention to detail to help you save time.

Tell me about security.

As a company dealing with sensitive personal information, serving law firms and medical practices, we take security and privacy very seriously. All of our tiers secure your valuable intellectual property and client data through data isolation and server encryption. We also undergo regular penetration testing by a third-party security company. See more about our security at [www.gavel.io/security](https://www.gavel.io/security).
